entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning in the evening then changing to rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming south 20 near midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
